pages.text: The $(mob)Holstaurus$() is a helper that can be spawned from the $(thing)Holstaurus Egg$(). It flees when attacked, but can trade various items in exchange for $(item)Holstaurus Tokens$(), similar to a $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villager$().
$(mob)Holstaurus$() can drop a $(item)Holstaurus Egg$() on death. This item can be used to spawn a passive $(mob)Holstaurus$() helper for the player.
